body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Abbott Richardson on October 17, 1821. Father of Presley P. Richardson, Hiram D. Richardson, William Richardson, Joseph B. Richardson, America T. Richardson, James A. Richardson, Henry C. Richardson, John M. Richardson, and Susan A. Richardson. Farmer in Hart County in 1850 and 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in 1850 and three in 1860.
